org.ambientdynamix.contextplugins.batterylevel

Interface IBatteryLevelInfo

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IContextInfo, Parcelable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BatteryLevelInfo

    interface IBatteryLevelInfo
extends IContextInfo
    Represents battery status information
    Author:
    Darren Carlson

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getBatteryLevel()
      Integer field containing the current battery level, from 0 to Scale (obtained from getScale()).
      int getHealth()
      Integer containing the current health constant.
      int getPlugged()
      Integer indicating whether the device is plugged in to a power source; 0 means it is on battery, other constants are different types of power sources.
      int getScale()
      Integer containing the maximum battery level.
      int getStatus()
      Integer containing the current status constant.
      String getTechnology()
      String describing the technology of the current battery.
      int getTemperature()
      Integer containing the current battery temperature.
      int getVoltage()
      Integer containing the current battery voltage level.
      boolean isPresent()
      Boolean indicating whether a battery is present.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • Methods inherited from interface org.ambientdynamix.api.application.IContextInfo

        getContextType, getImplementingClassname, getStringRepresentation, getStringRepresentationFormats
